biography: Eloise Eonnet is a French/American actress living between Paris and New York. She earned a BA in Psychology from Barnard College before fully dedicated herself to acting. Her film credits include Madeline (Dir. Daisy von Scherler Mayer), Passion of Mind (Dir. Alain Berliner), and 3 Women (Dir. Luciano Emmer). In New York, she gained first recognition on stage with her role in SeaWife (Dir. Liz Carlson), These Seven Sicknesses (Dir. Sylvanus Iskander), and Restoration Comedy (Dir. Sylvanus Iskander). Eloise also sings in the folk-americana band The Lobbyists and was trained as opera singer. Her role in According to Her (Dir. Estelle Artus) earned her critical acclaim in 2016.Â
name: Eloise Eonnet
